ModMetaData.name: [JP] Fertile Fields Makeover
ModMetaData.author: jptrrs
ModMetaData.description:
V1.0 Everybody loves Rainbeau's Fertile Fields... but only for what's inside! I thought it deserved better looks, so that's what I did. This is a recoloring and retexture of its resources. I didn't touch the buildings or the UI, tough, as it seems to me they fit well within the rest of the game. If you're also using dninemfive's Fertile Fields Dub's Hygiene Compat, I got you covered.
Rainbeau's Fertile Fields: https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1539311500 Fertile Fields Dub's Hygiene Compat: https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1602597619
